text: Hagi menina antahiho, tamagri tamagi eri'na nagra Mizpa kumate manine'na, Babiloni vahe'ma tagri'ma eme tagenaku'ma eterema hanaza zupa, nagra zamagrane keaga hugahue. Hianagi tamagra waini ragane, zafa rgaramine, olivi masavenena kavoramimpi eri atru nehuta, tamagrama erita mani'naza kuma tamimpina maniho.
